name: Sombrio Crank Liner Shorts - Men's
description: For long days in the saddlle. With a premium chamois, these liner shorts add extra comfort for epic days. They're super-breathable and stretchy, just throw your favourite riding shorts overtop.High and wide waistband design reduces slippage during your ride.Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility.Formula chamois improves comfort in the saddle.Poron® foam technology provides excellent vibration dampening.Flat stitching reduces chaffing.Base layer fit.
